name: Seize The Giant
description:
As you approach the giant city, you have a chance to save the people and the city.
It destroys everything it sees, it's terrible! You must stop it.

Can you stop it before everything is destroyed ?
Prepare your ropes, it's your duty to stop the giant!

This game is full of tension and action. So much fun!

The only way to stop the giant is to pull it with ropes. The stickman army is under your control. You can choose the gate you prefer with your one finger!
There are many gates that can help you stop the giant.
Once you leash the giant you can hit it to the wall. However, you should be careful, those walls can kill your army as well!
You can increase the number of your stickmen!
But remember, while the blue doors will help you, the red doors will make a bad effect, so avoid them.

A lot of obstacles are waiting for you on the way, if you get caught in the obstacles, you may break your rope or lose your stickman. And you start to lose the game…
Excited!

You gonna watch the giant destroy the city? If your answer is no, Seize the Giant!
